# NFCWindowSceneEvent.readerDetected

**Case**

The eligible device detected the RF field of an NFC reader.

## Declaration

```swift
case readerDetected
```

## Events

- **NFCWindowSceneEvent.presentation**: The user performed a gesture to present an NFC display.
